name: Sword of the Stars: Argos Naval Yard
name_original: Sword of the Stars: Argos Naval Yard
description:
Sword of the Stars: Argos Naval Yard is a game developed by Kerberos Productions. It came out on 17-06-2009. Paradox Interactive published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Sword of the Stars: Argos Naval Yard on PC.
It was produced by Christopher Stewart. Paul Ruskay scored the game.
